rooms.description: North-aligned entrance hall to welcome positive energy.
Spacious Scandinavian living area with ample natural light and minimalistic decor; located on the eastern side for prosperity.
Adjacent to living room, designed with an open concept layout.
Functional Scandinavian kitchen on the south side to balance energy flow.
Service area for laundry and storage.
A dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and ambient lighting on the west side to maintain calm energy.

openings.description: Vastu compliant placement for optimal positive energy flow.
Large windows ensuring natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: South-west oriented master bedroom for calm energy and restful sleep.
Additional bedroom with a view of the garden.
Functional room designed for the children.
Guest bedroom on the north-east side to balance energy flow.
Quiet study space designed with Scandinavian minimalism and natural light on the east.

openings.description: Provides access to an outdoor balcony for relaxation and fresh air.
Large windows ensuring natural light and proper ventilation.
